pageTitle: Maloja BarbaraM. Short - Women's | Competitive Cyclist
title: Women's Apparel
textBeforeTable: Maloja Size chart mountain biking Recommended Use: 2 back, 1 cargo Pockets: relaxed Fit: Tech Specs The Maloja Women's BarbaraM shorts come in Granite, Moonless, Pine, and Hazelnut. Sizes run X-Small to X-Large. The BarbaraM is constructed from Cordura Stretch fabric. Developed to be highly elastic and abrasion resistant, this lightweight fabric has a four way stretch that allows you to move naturally without the fabric pulling. The shorts are cut with a relaxed, slender fit in the hips and a looser fit through the legs. The waist comes with an internal adjustment system that helps you achieve a perfect fit without the added bulk of a belt. Two pockets give you storage options on the back of the pants. A single cargo pocket on the left leg gives you additional storage for nutrition or a spare tube.These shorts don't come with a chamois but can be easily integrated with your favorite liners on days when you need the support. When you're out on the trail
textAfterTable: How to Measure: For best results, take measurements over your underwear. Chest: Measure under your arms, around the fullest part of your chest. Natural Waist: Measure around your natural waistline, keeping the tape a bit loose. Hip: Measure around the fullest part of your body at the top of your legs. Inseam: Using pants that fit well, measure the crotch seam to the bottom of the leg.
